headline.main: FINLAND IS CAUGHT IN CRUEL DILEMMA; Republic Wants to Rectify the Russian Frontier, but Faces Domination of Nazis

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 4 -- What will be Helsinki's answer to Secretary of State Cordell Hull's statement that the continued association of Finland with Germany in pursuit of the war against Russia might force the "abandonment of the friendly attitude, on the part of the United States, toward the little republic?
